author: cschomak
body:
Added some plots with d on y-axis vs. d
Had to add some if clauses to the GeometryComparisonPlotter.cc to handle the case if n_x_variables > n_y_variables which resulted in very squeezed global plots.

Backported PR 9838 fto 74X
title: d<angle> vs. d<rotation> plots added to geometry comparison tool
